page.title: 06EDUCATION - PRIMARY
page.content: PRIMARY SCHOOL LIFE At Bradwell school we have several modern electrical machines; a computer, video recorder, television and radio. They all help to make our work interesting and vivid. We had a concert at Easter in which we sang songs, played musical instruments and performed a play about Robin Hood. This year our outside charity was the N.S.P.C.C.. We raised Â£160 which was presented to Princess Margaret at Derby Cathedral by two children from this school. We have competitions against other primary schools in soccer, netball, swimming and athletics. We have been busy forming a library in school in which we have numbered and colour coded the topic books so we can find them easily.
